text:
@DineshDSouza @LinquistMike @realDonaldTrump Hospitals are getting paid for every #Covid-19 patient. Then these patients are their guinea pigs to test their toxic medication. 
My guess anyone that dies in the hospitals will be stamped as having covid-19 to get their numbers up so they can be compensated
